amendment.description: Amendment provides that eminent domain may not be used to acquire lands in fee or in trust for an Indian tribe recognized under this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 111-131 to provide that eminent domain may not be used to acquire lands in fee or in trust for an Indian tribe recognized under this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Goodlatte.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
